languages.text: "Тассерций употребили во зло, но это не значит, что он не способен принести пользу. Минерал надо досконально изучить и только потом решать, уничтожить его или включить в десятину".

traits.locale_text: "Говорит Лорд-капитан. Мы живы, скоро будем. Ожидайте".

languages.text: "Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it, or include it in the tithe."
languages.original_text: "Тассерций употребили во зло, но это не значит, что он не способен принести пользу. Минерал надо досконально изучить и только потом решать, уничтожить его или включить в десятину".

"Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it or include it in the tithe."

"Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it, or include it in the tithe."

languages.text: “塔瑟拉水晶曾被用于邪恶的目的，但这并不意味着它没有其他用途。我们需要对这种矿物进行彻底研究，之后再决定是将它销毁，还是纳入什一税资源清单之中。”
languages.original_text: "Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it, or include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: “塔瑟拉水晶曾被用于邪恶的目的，但这并不意味着它没有其他用途。我们需要对这种矿物进行彻底研究，之后再决定是将它销毁，还是纳入什一税资源清单之中。”

languages.text: 「タッセリウムは邪悪な目的に使われてきたが、それが有用でないということにはならない。この鉱物を破壊するか、租税に加えるかを決める前に、徹底的に研究しなければならない」
languages.original_text: "Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it, or include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセリウムは邪悪な目的に使われてきたが、それが有用でないということにはならない。この鉱物を破壊するか、租税に加えるかを決める前に、徹底的に研究しなければならない」

languages.text: «El thassertio se ha utilizado con fines perniciosos, pero eso no significa que no pueda resultar útil. Debemos estudiar a fondo este mineral antes de decidir si se destruye o se añade al diezmo».
languages.original_text: "Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it, or include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: «El thassertio se ha utilizado con fines perniciosos, pero eso no significa que no pueda resultar útil. Debemos estudiar a fondo este mineral antes de decidir si se destruye o se añade al diezmo».

languages.text: "Tasertiyum kötü amaçlar için kullanılmış olsa da bu onun faydalı olamayacağı anlamına gelmez. Madeni yok etmeye ya da aşara dâhil etmeye karar vermeden önce kapsamlı bir şekilde incelemeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it, or include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Tasertiyum kötü amaçlar için kullanılmış olsa da bu onun faydalı olamayacağı anlamına gelmez. Madeni yok etmeye ya da aşara dâhil etmeye karar vermeden önce kapsamlı bir şekilde incelemeliyiz."

languages.text: « Le thassertium a été utilisé à des fins malveillantes, mais ça ne veut pas dire qu'il est inutile. Nous devons sérieusement étudier ce minerai avant de décider de le détruire... ou de l'inclure dans la dîme. »
languages.original_text: "Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it, or include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: « Le thassertium a été utilisé à des fins malveillantes, mais ça ne veut pas dire qu'il est inutile. Nous devons sérieusement étudier ce minerai avant de décider de le détruire... ou de l'inclure dans la dîme. »

languages.text: "Thassertium wurde für üble Zwecke missbraucht, aber das heißt nicht, dass es nicht nützlich sein kann. Wir müssen das Mineral gründlich untersuchen, bevor wir entscheiden, ob wir es zerstören oder dem Zehnt hinzufügen."
languages.original_text: "Thassertium has been used for wicked ends, but that does not mean it cannot be useful. We must study the mineral thoroughly before deciding whether to destroy it, or include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Thassertium wurde für üble Zwecke missbraucht, aber das heißt nicht, dass es nicht nützlich sein kann. Wir müssen das Mineral gründlich untersuchen, bevor wir entscheiden, ob wir es zerstören oder dem Zehnt hinzufügen."
